name: Nike Women's Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction . Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes. Black front chest logo.

name: Nike Women's Sportswear T-Shirt
description: The must-have, everyday tee is back and better than ever before..

name: Nike Women's Workout T-Shirt
description: Nike Women's Long Sleeve T-Shirt Dri-FIT fabric wicks moisture away. Ideal for a variety of training conditions. Swoosh at upper left chest. 100% polyester.

name: Nike Women's Training Pants
description: Ideal for high-intensity training and competition, Women's Nike Victory Training Pants deliver the sweat-wicking power of Dri-FIT technology in a body-hugging silhouette.

name: Nike Women's Leggings
description: Slip into high-waisted coverage with the Nike Sportswear Club Leggings. Featuring a bold Swoosh design and a waistband with a repeating pattern, they're crafted for all-day comfort.

name: Nike Men's Training Pants
description: Nike Men's Training Pant, featuring an elastic waistband with drawcord for a snug fit and side pockets for secure storage.

name: Nike Men's Jogger
description: A closet staple, the Nike Sportswear Joggers combine a classic look with the soft comfort of fleece for an elevated, everyday look that you can wear every day.

name: Nike Essential Short Sleeve
description: The Nike Essential Short Sleeve provides protection on areas covered. Dri-FIT technology keeps you dry and comfortable. Internal neck tape is comfortable against the skin.

name: Nike Men's Short Sleeve Swim Tee
description: Nike men's short sleeve hydro guard is designed with comfort and protection in mind. It's finished with flat seams to prevent chafing, and soft dri-fit fabric to Wisk moisture away.

reviews.comment: Very comfortable for running long distance

name: Adidas Women's Plus Size Tee
description: This women's adidas t-shirt is versatile in its simplicity and features a classic-look crewneck to keep its shape.

name: Adidas Women's Sport Tee
description: Celebrate your love of sport with this adidas t-shirt. Without saying a word, it says everything and keeps you comfortable, too.

name: Adidas Men's Trefoil T-Shirt
description: Ready-to-wear, sport the trendy trefoil graphic t-shirt from adidas Originals. A simple design, this short sleeve tee features a large, rubber-print logo on the front so you can show off your love of the brand.

name: Adidas Men's Freelift Tee
description: Designed with overhead movements in mind, this adidas workout t-shirt offers a full range of motion. It's made of moisture-absorbing fabric with a soft, cotton-like feel.

name: Adidas Men's Training Pants
description: Slip on sporty style between training sessions. A tapered-leg fit gives these pants a comfortable, modern look. They're made of a slightly shiny French terry with a towel-like feel.

name: Reebok Men's Classic Track Pants
description: International flags inspire the design of these men's track pants. Adjust the ankles with drawcords to change your look. Woven fabric feels smooth.

name: Reebok Women's Training Pant
description: The simple, classic look of these women's pants keep you reaching for them again and again. They're made of soft French terry for a comfortable feel that lasts all day long.

name: Reebok Women's Training T-Shirt
description: Speedwick moisture management and comfortable fabric take this basic gym wear T-shirt to a whole new level. The essential tee is ready to take on the toughest WOD with a layer of comfort.

name: Reebok Women's Classic Tee
description: All-cotton jersey feels soft and comfy.

name: Reebok Unisex Classic Vector Tee
description: A contrast Reebok Vector logo gives this tee a confident, sporty look. All-cotton jersey feels soft and comfy.

name: Reebok Men's Training Tee
description: This men's t-shirt helps you settle in on reset days with a casual, soft cotton build.
